data.actual_result: The search only finds the server specific emotes (Server Specific emote: <http://i.imgur.com/QH8K5L2.png> / Normal emote: <http://i.imgur.com/gzvdVPA.png>)

data.steps_to_repro: - Search for an server specific emote and after it, a normal emote - Look at the results
